metadata.title: CVE-2021-30157 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.31.12 and 1.32.x through 1.35.x before 1.35.2. On ChangesList special pages such as Special:RecentChanges and Special:Watchlist, some of the rcfilters-filter-* label messages are output in HTML unescaped, leading to XSS.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
